metadata.title: CVE-2022-48776 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mtd: parsers: qcom: Fix missing free for pparts in cleanupMtdpart doesn't free pparts when a cleanup function is declared.Add missing free for pparts in cleanup function for smem to fix theleak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
